Content:
## :book: CoDA: Collaborative Novel Box Discovery and Cross-modal Alignment for Open-vocabulary 3D Object Detection (NeurIPS2023)

üî•Please star CoDA ‚≠ê and share it. Thanksüî•

> [[Paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/2310.02960)]   [[Project Page](https://yangcaoai.github.io/publications/CoDA.html)]
> [Yang Cao](https://yangcaoai.github.io/), Yihan Zeng, [Hang Xu](https://xuhangcn.github.io/), [Dan Xu](https://www.danxurgb.net)
> The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
> Huawei Noah's Ark Lab :triangular_flag_on_post: **Updates** ☑ Our new work **CoDAv2** is accepted by TPAMI, check out it [here](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2406.00830v2) ! ☑ As the first work to introduce 3D Gaussian Splatting into 3D Object Detection, 3DGS-DET is released [here](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2410.01647) ! ☑ Latest papers&codes about open-vocabulary perception are collected [here](https://github.com/yangcaoai/Awesome-Open-Vocabulary-Perception). ☑ All the codes, data and pretrained models have been released! ☑ The training and testing codes have been released. ☑ The pretrained models have been released. ☑ The OV-setting SUN-RGBD datasets have been released. ☑ The OV-setting ScanNet datasets have been released. ☑ Paper LaTeX codes are available at https://scienhub.com/Yang/CoDA. ## Framework ## Samples ## Installation

## :book: CoDA: Collaborative Novel Box Discovery and Cross-modal Alignment for Open-vocabulary 3D Object Detection (NeurIPS2023)

üî•Please star CoDA ‚≠ê and share it. Thanksüî•

> [[Paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/2310.02960)]   [[Project Page](https://yangcaoai.github.io/publications/CoDA.html)]
> [Yang Cao](https://yangcaoai.github.io/), Yihan Zeng, [Hang Xu](https://xuhangcn.github.io/), [Dan Xu](https://www.danxurgb.net)
> The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
> Huawei Noah's Ark Lab :triangular_flag_on_post: **Updates** ☑ Our new work **CoDAv2** is accepted by TPAMI, check out it [here](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2406.00830v2) ! ☑ As the first work to introduce 3D Gaussian Splatting into 3D Object Detection, 3DGS-DET is released [here](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2410.01647) ! ☑ Latest papers&codes about open-vocabulary perception are collected [here](https://github.com/yangcaoai/Awesome-Open-Vocabulary-Perception). ☑ All the codes, data and pretrained models have been released! ☑ The training and testing codes have been released. ☑ The pretrained models have been released. ☑ The OV-setting SUN-RGBD datasets have been released. ☑ The OV-setting ScanNet datasets have been released. ☑ Paper LaTeX codes are available at https://scienhub.com/Yang/CoDA. ## Framework ## Samples ## Installation

Content:
Our code is based on PyTorch 1.8.1, torchvision==0.9.1, CUDA 10.1 and Python 3.7. It may work with other versions.

Please also install the following Python dependencies:
Translation:
Our code is based on PyTorch 1.8.1, torchvision==0.9.1, CUDA 10.1 and Python 3.7. It may work with other versions.

Please also install the following Python dependencies:

Content: Please install a Cythonized implementation of gIOU for faster training.
Translation: Please install a Cythonized implementation of gIOU for faster training.

Content:
```
conda install cython
cd utils && python cython_compile.py build_ext --inplace
```
Translation:
```
conda install cython
cd utils && python cython_compile.py build_ext --inplace
```

Content:
## Dataset preparation

To achieve the OV setting, we re-organize the original [ScanNet](https://github.com/facebookresearch/votenet/tree/main/scannet) and [SUN RGB-D](https://github.com/facebookresearch/votenet/tree/main/sunrgbd) and adopt annotations of more categories. Please directly download the ov-setting datasets we provide here: [OV SUN RGB-D](https://huggingface.co/datasets/YangCaoCS/Open-Vocabulary-SUN-RGBD) and [OV ScanNet](https://hkustconnect-my.sharepoint.com/:f:/g/personal/ycaobd_connect_ust_hk/EsqoPe7-VFxOlY0a-v1-vPwBSiEHoGRTgK5cLIhnjyXiEQ?e=jY7nKT). 

Then run for the downloaded *.tar file:
Translation:
## Dataset preparation

To achieve the OV setting, we re-organize the original [ScanNet](https://github.com/facebookresearch/votenet/tree/main/scannet) and [SUN RGB-D](https://github.com/facebookresearch/votenet/tree/main/sunrgbd) and adopt annotations of more categories. Please directly download the ov-setting datasets we provide here: [OV SUN RGB-D](https://huggingface.co/datasets/YangCaoCS/Open-Vocabulary-SUN-RGBD) and [OV ScanNet](https://hkustconnect-my.sharepoint.com/:f:/g/personal/ycaobd_connect_ust_hk/EsqoPe7-VFxOlY0a-v1-vPwBSiEHoGRTgK5cLIhnjyXiEQ?e=jY7nKT). 

Then run for the downloaded *.tar file:

## :e-mail: Contact

If you have any question or collaboration need (research purpose or commercial purpose), please email `yangcao.cs@gmail.com`.

## :scroll: Acknowledgement
CoDA is inspired by [CLIP](https://github.com/openai/CLIP) and [3DETR](https://github.com/facebookresearch/3detr). We appreciate their great codes.
